concept.title: Geo IP
concept.shortdesc: The Geo IP processor provides geographic location information for IP addresses. The Geo IP processor uses the MaxMind GeoIP2 database file to provide geolocation information. You must provide your own copy of the database file.

conbody.draft-comment: Do they have to have their own geoIP2 database file?
conbody.p: Geo IP processoroverviewprocessorsGeo IPTo use the Geo IP processor, you define the location of the database file, specify one or more IP address input fields, name the corresponding output field, and specify the geolocation information that you want.
The input field must be an Integer or String datatype with IP addresses formatted as follows: n.n.n.n.check how this should be expressed.

Geo IP can provide the following geolocation information for each IP address:
Country name
Country ISO code
City name
Latitude
Longitude
